ValidationMessage.name: CasCashInvalidCheckInAmount
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The actual amount for payment method #paymentMethod# must be greater than 0.
ValidationMessage.comment: The absolute paid amount must be greater than zero

ValidationMessage.name: CasCashExpenseTypeNeeded
ValidationMessage.comment: Expense Type should have some value

ValidationMessage.name: CasCashValidateMinAmount
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The total value #totalValue# of the sales document is smaller than the minimum value #minValue# of the template.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if the paid amount is less than the value speficied in the template.

ValidationMessage.name: CasCashValidateMaxAmount
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The total value #totalValue# of the sales document is greater than the maximum value #maxValue# of the template.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if the paid amount is greater than the value speficied in the template.
